Package net.xqhs.flash.core

Class Entity.EntityIndex

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.xqhs.flash.core.Entity.EntityIndex
  • Enclosing interface:
    Entity<P extends Entity<?>>
    public static final class Entity.EntityIndex
extends java.lang.Object
    An index of all local entities, allowing the retrieval of a string in the form of type":"name"."index for any entity, just by providing a reference to the entity.

    The index is different for different entities with the same type and name.

    In order for the entity to have such a printable name, it must have been previously registered, so as to retain its type and compute its index. Normally, registration should be done by a loader (most likely the loader that loads that entity).

    The name of the entity is kept as provided by Entity.getName().

    Author:
    Andrei Olaru

        public static java.lang.String register​(java.lang.String entityType,
                                        Entity<? extends Entity<?>> entity)
        Registers an entry for an entity.
        Parameters:
        entityType - - the type of the entity (e.g. "node").
        entity - - the entity to register.
        Returns:
        the printable string for this entity.

      • mockPrint

        public static java.lang.String mockPrint​(java.lang.String entityType,
                                         java.lang.String entityName)
        Returns a printable string, as if an entity is registered, but without the entity being registered (or, indeed, instantiated). The presumed name of the entity needs to be provided.
        Parameters:
        entityType - - the type of the entity (e.g. "node").
        entityName - - the name of the entity.
        Returns:
        the printable string for this entity, as if it were registered.
